author: rhuijben
msg: On updating a working copy node with an update editor, provide the old
and new revision to the notify handler to allow GUI clients to tell
users exactly what changed in an update operation.
The old base revision is lost after the update so this is the
last time the revision is available for these clients.
(svn_wc_notify_t): Document extra usage of revision member and add
(close_directory): Pass old and new revision to notify handler.
(close_file): Pass old and new revision to notify handler.

author: rhuijben
msg: (test_list): Mark diff_svnpatch as skipped until the test is fixed.
(test_list): Mark all tests as skipped until the tests are fixed.
* The diff_svnpatch test is failing on all buildbots
* All these tests are broken on the Windows Buildbot.
* The patch tests depend on gnu patch, its output format and platform
specific disk paths (Pass on some of the builbots)

author: hwright
msg: (insert_lock): Use a public structure to interface with this function.
